UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Venom peptides from solitary hunting wasps induce feeding disorder in lepidopteran larvae.
Literature.Author: Baek JH, Ji Y, Shin JS, Lee S, Lee SH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>200µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>200µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=>200µM),Lymantria dispar FB cells(no activity data),Spodoptera frugiperda ovarian Sf9 cells(no activity data)
